Name: Russian
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of coin-sized orange zest twist.
Review: Gin and vodka with a sweet hint of chocolate.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Russian contains 152 calories
